speaker: Throne Room
lines: A throne of interlocked names sits under a window that refuses to light tyrants.
The floor is a mirror for choices; it shows only what you keep.
A crown rests on a cushion that looks relieved.
The air smells of cedar, ink, and endings.
Footsteps approach from behind the throne; they are careful with their echoes.
A figure arrives wearing a body like a borrowed robe and a smile like a signature.
The Regent inclines the head it uses today and invites you to negotiate.
The negotiation has rules you will not like.

choices.text: Name the debt you erased below.
Bow and learn a worse lesson.
